thread.section_title: Broadway at Times Square Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Watch the rates!!! They changed mine!
thread.title_full: Watch the rates!!! They changed mine! - Review of Broadway at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Julie B
title: Watch the rates!!! They changed mine!
text: Hotel clean and well located. Typical size for NYC. A bit smaller than your "normal" room. Staff in housekeeping were wonderful . That said we were here during a blizzard and were met prior to the weather by a desk clerk who said he wasn't coming to work during the weather!? Made me feel very welcome....NOT! Then we we checked out 4 days later my rate had been increased from $159 to $210 for the last two nights. This wasn't what I was Quote: d. I could have stayed at a nicer hotel for those rates!!! Very disappointed.
